content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in arezzo the case involved two parties referred to as ro gi and la gi the court ruled that the assets in question should be considered communal property and divided them equally between the parties la gi was also ordered to pay ro gi a sum of €297867 the court considered the parties marriage separation and divorce as well as the evidence presented before making its decision the costs of the judgment including the courtappointed expert will be divided equally between the parties
